title: Chat bar not showing up/blank
body: Pretty much what the title says. Logged in to the client and the home screen loads up but the friends/chat bar on the right is completely blank, and cant seem to invite friends to matches.

replies.body: UP HELP  , after a week maybe RIOT can answer ?

Possible workaround for the empty friends list bug (for Win 10):

1. Press "Start"
2. Search "Date and Time"
3. Select "Date and Time Settings"
4. Activate "Set time automatically" and "Set time zone automatically"
5. Press "Sync now" under "Synchronise your clock"
6. Reload your client
Thanks for the workaround, but it didn't fix the issue this time :(

Beyond that best suggestion is a clean reinstall via Hextech Repair Tool.

Both combined seem to fix the issue for most players but not all, so good luck. :(

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
